name: Dozen
description:
Hello, visitor! Thanks for stoping by! Hope you enjoy my game!

How to play
Arrow keys / ASD to move the falling tile in that direction. 
Up arrow / W for a hard drop.
Tiles merge based on the (slightly) different rules of each mode.
Lines of only 12's, 24's, 48's, etc. are cleared.
Clear as many lines as you can before no more tiles can drop!

Features
● Simple and clean UI.
● Easy and intuitive controls.
● Several game modes, sizes and speeds.
● Perfect for both casual and advanced players.
● Progress is autosaved separately for all game modes.

You can also play the standalone game on GitHub or get it on Google Play!
